episode_event_champion_galar/4001_1001_0:
I hereby announce the start of the second
Neo Champion Stadium!
The head judge will be me, Leon!

Therefore, I’ve decided the criteria the next
Neo Champion will be judged on.

We’ll be judging your passion for victory and
determination to grow stronger together with
everyone!

Show me your best teamwork in
three-on-three battles!
Now, challengers! Try and beat us!
episode_event_champion_galar/6801_1001_0:
Now then! Let’s have ourselves a superb battle
that Pasio will remember forever!

It doesn’t have the same impact when you say
it, Hop.

We should behave so we’re a good example for
others, right?
episode_event_champion_galar/4002_1001_0:
What?! Are they seriously asking us to beat
Leon’s team?

Winning isn’t the only way to become a
Neo Champion.

But I want everyone to challenge us as if truly
trying to beat us!

I can’t give the Neo Champion title to someone
whose heart isn’t in it!

Assemble your best team, and make sure you’re
all in perfect condition and ready to work together
on the day of the tournament!
I look forward to battling everyone!
episode_event_champion_galar/4004_1001_0: We have to beat them, huh.
episode_event_champion_galar/4005_1001_0: Hehe! Our hard training paid off!

But who should we invite to be our third
team member?
A lot of our choices didn’t work out.
I thought you’d definitely team up with Piers.

Sorry. Big Bro was invited to join Raihan’s team
straight away.
He’s so unfair, just deciding his own team like that.
episode_event_champion_galar/4005_1001_1:
It is what it is... Piers definitely wants to win
this one.
Sonia and Nessa teamed up as well.
They’ve always really wanted to beat Lee.
Bea also looked more fired up than usual...
And surprisingly, Gloria and Victor are judges.

I was so shocked! There’s no way those two aren’t
interested in being Neo Champion, right?
Yeah, they must have their reasons...

Well, I guess there’s no point talking about what’s
already decided.

After we train a bit more, let’s go find
a teammate!
episode_event_champion_galar/4005_1001_2:
If you haven’t decided on a teammate, shall I give
you a hand?

A hand from myself and Articuno, the most
elite sync pair of them all!
episode_event_champion_galar/4006_1001_0:
How about it, you two? If you team up with me,
I won’t accept defeat.

You talk all high and mighty...but aren’t you in
the same boat? You’re looking for teammates
because you couldn’t find anyone to join, right?

There simply wasn’t anyone who could match
my skills.

Sure, whatever. Well, we’re lookin’ for a
teammate, too. Wanna join us?

I didn’t expect the three Legendary bird Pokémon
from Galar to come together like this.

I remember my Zapdos running around so fast that
it was a pain to try to catch...

I was troubled by Articuno’s behavior of toying
with people.

I had trouble with Moltres because it was so
finicky and intimidating...
episode_event_champion_galar/4006_1001_1: All three of them are kinda rebellious, aren’t they.

I’m kinda worried whether we can show Lee the
kind of teamwork he’s expecting...

I think we Trainers need to get on the same
page first.
episode_event_champion_galar/4007_1001_0: Thanks for helping me out, Gloria, Victor.

As judges, you forfeit the right to become
Neo Champion...
But I...I really wanted to ask you two.

I know everyone’s gonna be super passionate
about beating me and becoming the
Neo Champion!
Raihan and Sonia, and not just them...

I thought you two would be the best pair to help
me face such feelings.
Those words are enough for me.
For you to acknowledge our skills, Leon...
It’s just as good as becoming the Neo Champion!
episode_event_champion_galar/4007_1001_1:
We also want to see everyone’s conviction—and
face it head on!
That’s why we took you up on your offer.
I guess I was right in asking you two.
But there sure is a lot of pressure, isn’t there!

I bet Hop and the others are just burning to
beat us.
Yeah, I can definitely see that!
Are you looking forward to battling Hop the most?
Of course! We’re rivals, after all!

That’s why we’re gonna battle all out with
no regrets!
Yes! I feel the same way!
episode_event_champion_galar/4007_1001_2:
Right! Let’s train so we can be ready to take on
the challengers!
episode_event_champion_galar/4008_1001_0: So our opponents are Lee, Victor, and Gloria.
We won’t win by just attacking randomly.
It’d help if they had a weakness or habit...

Honestly, Lee is so strong, I’m not sure we could
beat him three-on-one...

But in a heated battle, he can sometimes get so
into it that he gets tunnel vision!
Gloria is very strong on offense...
But I think her defense could be better.

Victor always makes the optimal choice in battle,
and he usually takes the win.
episode_event_champion_galar/4008_1001_1: Just thinking about it is getting on my nerves.
Yeah! That IS how Victor battles!

Which means there’s a good chance Victor will
be the one calling the shots!

Smart thinking! I’d expect no less from someone
who’s gonna be the best professor!

But that’s his strength. Does Victor have any
weaknesses?

There are times when he overthinks tactics, which
can slightly delay his instructions to his Pokémon.

We might be able to catch the three of them off
guard that way.
episode_event_champion_galar/4008_1001_2: Right! If we use that plan against Lee’s team...
Of course. I won’t tolerate failure.
Now then, let’s start our final push!
episode_event_champion_galar/4009_1101_0: On the day of the tournament...

And facing them were the Champion team,
who’d been steadily but consistently battling
their way through any and all opponents.
episode_event_champion_galar/4009_1001_0:
Seems you’re serious about taking the
Neo Champion title!

You being the only Champion of Galar is a bit
boring, right?

Today’s the day we wash away all the
frustrations we’ve had up till now!

I’ll be getting my revenge for that humiliating
defeat at that stadium in Galar!
episode_event_champion_galar/4009_1001_1: Not gonna get me with that!
What?! I’m the only one left?!
episode_event_champion_galar/4010_1001_0:
Let’s show them our bond’s as strong as
a monolith!

Let the winds blow!
Stream forward, Sandstorm!

We can’t let our opponents use the field to their
advantage! Leon! Gloria!
Nope, I can’t let that happen. We’ve got to win.
episode_event_champion_galar/4010_1001_1: Raihan! Gordie! Now’s your chance! Go!
episode_event_champion_galar/4011_1001_0:
Can you hear that? The excitement is nearly
through the roof.
All of you! Hit me with all you’ve got!
Of course! Brace yourselves, Lee, Victor, Gloria!
We’re gonna win and become Neo Champions!

I’ll cover the heat of the crowd in the color
of Bede!
episode_event_champion_galar/4011_1001_1:
We’re gonna show everyone the greatest battle
ever—and set the world on fire!
episode_event_champion_galar/4012_1001_0: They made it into a one-on-one!

Are you trying to take us down individually?
Not good enough!

Have a taste of our true power!
Don’t take us lightly, Lee!
Sorry, but we’re gonna win today, Gloria!
They’re after something... What is it?

If taking us down individually isn’t the plan,
then maybe...
episode_event_champion_galar/4012_1001_1: Don’t let the other two get all the best bits!
I knew it! They were after me from the start...
You’re too fired up, Lee! You’ve gotta look around!
episode_event_champion_galar/4012_1001_2: Should you really be looking away, Gloria?
Hey now! I’m your opponent, Lee!
Gotta work on that defense, Gloria!
episode_event_champion_galar/4012_1001_3:
You got me! I didn’t expect to be cornered
like this!
But...I won’t give up, no matter what!

It’s not over yet! I’m gonna show you a
champion time!

I know better than anyone you’re not easy to
beat, Lee!
The three of us are gonna open up a new future!
episode_event_champion_galar/4013_1001_0:
After deliberation, the other judges and I have
chosen you all as Neo Champions.

You did your research on us and came up with
an excellent strategy, and that showed us your
passion for victory!

Furthermore, your teamwork utilized each of your
three sync pairs’ strengths...

That proved your determination to get
stronger together!
As frustrating as it is, you completely crushed us!
Well, I’m sure that plan would only work once.

None of you are foolish enough to fall for the
same thing twice.

We know you the best, so we know you’re not
that easy to beat.
episode_event_champion_galar/4013_1001_1:
You were able to claim this victory because you
three are close to Leon and his team members.

That’s right! You always face them with everything
you’ve got, and that’s how you came up with
that plan!

We tried our best, but...we’ve still got a ways
to go.

Truly well done! We’re all so happy you
actually won!

The crowd will definitely remember how gallantly
your team fought.

Sis... You all... From now on, everyone will be
watching what you do...
I know, I know... Be a good role model, right?

No need to worry. I wouldn’t make a fool
of myself.
Yeah! I won’t let this title go to my head.
We’re gonna carry on—and get stronger together!
